summary: An imperfect earthy re-texture of Backsteppo\'s Dragon Quest 3 Sage Outfit.
descriptionHtml:
An Imperfect  Re-Texture of Backsteppo\'s Dragon Quest Sage Outfit.
skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9387

It\'s for UNP, But I use CBBE in the images. I think it should look alright with any body. 

Standalone::
Can be crafted under leather. Upgradable at the table with elves ears. 

Update:: I\'ve added a new file wear the cape no longer takes up the amulet slot. Now you can wear your amulets with the cape. Lighting issues fixed, craftable under leather at the forge. 
Changed from clothing to light armor (more of a personal thing since I only use light armor). 
Normal maps were changed a bit.

Backsteppo is M.I.A at the moment, which means that I haven\'t got word from him about uploading the re-texture. But he seems to encourage people to do as they please with his work. So with that, I\'ve decided to put this up for download. 

I edited the armor to be transparent so instead of just new textures, the mesh was edited to be transparent. So new mesh, new texture. You don\'t need to download Backsteppo\'s Sage Outfit. 

Issues
=======
This re-texture has lots of flaws. It\'s not perfect! Sorry!
=======
Permissions:
DO NOT upload any of my works with out my expressed permission. Thank you. 
I do not give permissions to upload my works on Steam, whatsoever. 
Credits
=======
Thanks to Backsteppo for his amazing armor and the freedom to edit them!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9387

Thanks to LABTECH for putting a link on her amazing re-colors for the Sage Outfit! 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10710

Thanks to jacktthompson for creating a great fix for the lighting issue! (God knows I was having the worse time figuring out how to do that.) 

Thanks to Nikinoodles for allowing me to use his edited sage cloak! 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092

Thanks to everyone who encourages me with nice words, thoughtful critiques and great suggestions! Without you all, this file would have remain a hot mess. 



Enjoy!!
author: DreamBurrow

files.name: DreamBurrows Sage Outfit Standalone
files.changelogHtml:
Can now wear the cloak with amulets.
Lighting issues fixed. No longer becomes weirdly dark in some lightings.
Changed crafting to leather.
Better standalone version, no longer will complete overwrite the original Sage Outfit.
First person texture view fully fixed.

files.name: DreamBurrows Sage Outfit Standalone - Male Cloak compatible
files.fileName: DreamBurrows Sage Outfit Standalone - Male Cloak compatible-17699-2-1.rar
files.changelogHtml: Cloak can now be worn by males. By request.
